We need your serial
number to get started.

How to find your serial number >

How to find your serial number

  • 1. Go to Settings > Bluetooth.

    2. Find your AirPods in the list.

    3. Tap the Info button next to your AirPods, and you'll see the serial number

What’s happening with your AirPods?

Your Product: AirPods, 2nd Gen

We will replace your AirPods

We will replace both sides of your AirPods to

ensure the quality of the repair and best

customer experience.
